title: Did Tyrone Woodfork beat up an old Oklahoma couple?
subtitle: Woodfork, aged 22, was sentenced to life imprisonment on two separate counts of murder, assault and battery with a dangerous weapon, and two counts of first-degree rape.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Bob and Nancy Sternt, an elderly Tulsa in Oklahoma, were beaten and robbed at their home by Tyrone Woodfork.
